question: Which authority has approved the draft of Banking Regulations in International Financial Services Centres (IFSC)?
option3: Securities and Exchange Board of India
explanation:
The International Financial Services Centres Authority (IFSCA) has approved the draft of the International Financial Services Centres Authority (Banking) Regulations, 2020. This was enable setting up of banking units in the International Financial Services Centre.
The regulation would be notified by the Government of India soon, which will contain what kind of banking activities that would be permitted in the IFSC.
